SA15bsa066_u:12: iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prayojanādiśūnye na kvacitpravartanta ityato 'dhikṛtaśāstrasya prayojanādipradarśanena prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyarthamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:13_1: śāstramārabhyate ityukte saṃbhavatyevaṃvādī paraḥ- nārabdhavyamidaṃ prayojanarahitatvāt unmattakavākyavat /
SA15bsa066_u:15: tathā asaṃbaddhatvāt daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaṃ sara kīṭiketyādivākyavat /
SA15bsa066_u:17: ayaṃ cābhidheyaprayojane eva darśayati sākṣāt saṃbandhaṃ tu sāmarthyena /
SA15bsa066_u:18: yathā caitadevaṃ tathā sukhapratipattyarthamevameva leśato vyākhyāya darśayiṣyāmaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:21: vyākhyāṃ vihāya tattvajñaiḥ sā coktā padavākyayoḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:24: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sābhāsam parasaṃvide pratyakṣam anumānam ca sābhāsam tu ātmasaṃvide iti padāni //
SA15bsa066_u:26: sādhyate aneneti siddhirvā sādhayatīti vā sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:36: nanu vakṣyati sādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇānīti tadetatkatham / ucyate /
SA15bsa066_u:37: sādhanābhāsa eva kiṃcitsāmyena sādhanopacārādadoṣaḥ ityetacca tatraiva nirloṭhayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:50: parasaṃvide ityatra pare prāśnikāḥ saṃvedanaṃ saṃvid avabodha ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:51: pareṣāṃ saṃvit parasaṃvit tasyai parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya /
SA15bsa066_u:56: sādhanadūṣaṇe eva sābhāse parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya na pratyakṣānumāne /
SA15bsa066_u:58: yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ pārthe dhanurdhārayati sati ko 'nyo dhanurdhārayati iti //
SA15bsa066_u:59: pratyakṣam ityatra akṣamindriyaṃ tataśca pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryatvenendriyaṃ prati gatamityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:60: idaṃ ca vakṣyati pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍham ityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:61: tathā mīyate aneneti mānaṃ paricchedyata ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:77: ātmā ceha cittacaittasaṃtānarūpaḥ parigṛhyate na tu paraparikalpito nittyatvādidharmā /
SA15bsa066_u:81: pratyakṣānumāne eva sābhāse ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya na sādhanadūṣaṇe ātmasaṃvitphalatvāt tayoḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:82: āha nanu sādhanamapi vastuto 'numānameva tataścānumānamityādyukte sādhanābhidhānaṃ na yujyate asminvā prāgukte anumānābhidhānamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:93: iha ca sādhanādayo 'ṣṭau padārthāḥ abhidheyatayā uktāḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:99: āha- yadyevaṃ parasaṃvittyātmasaṃvittyoḥ prakaraṇārthaparijñānena vyavahitatvādaprayojanatvamiti / na /
SA15bsa066_u:113: idamiha śrotaṇāṃ prayojanamuktaṃ kartustarhi kiṃ prayojanamiti vācyam /
SA15bsa066_u:132: tatra yathoddeśastathā nirdeśa iti kṛtvā sādhanasvarūpāvadhāraṇāyāha //
SA15bsa066_u:135: tatra teṣu sādhanādiṣu sādhanaṃ tāvannirdhāryate iti /
SA15bsa066_u:137: atra guṇanimittaṃ sādhanatvena guṇena nirdhāryate iti /
SA15bsa066_u:157: na punaryathā lambakarṇaḥ brāhmaṇādayo varṇā iti /
SA15bsa066_u:161: na punarādīyate ityādiḥ yathā brāhmaṇādayo varṇā ityadāviti /
SA15bsa066_u:162: tataḥ susthitamidaṃ pakṣaḥ ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:166: iha ca yadā sādhyate 'neneti sādhanaṃ karaṇābhidhānārthaḥ sādhanaśabdastadā pakṣopalakṣitāni hetutvādivacanāni sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:168: yadā punarbhāvasādhanaḥ siddhiḥ sādhanamiti tadā pakṣādivacanajanyaṃ pratipādyagataṃ jñānameva sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:172: yadā tu kartṛsādhanaḥ sādhayatīti sādhanaṃ tadā pakṣādivacanānyeva kartṛtvena vivakṣyante pratipādyasaṃtāne jñānotpādakatvāt iti /
SA15bsa066_u:178: uktaṃ ca diṅnāgācāryeṇa sādhanamiti caikavacananirdeśaḥ samastasādhanatvakhyāpanārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:181: idaṃ ca na jñāyate kiṃ kārakamuta vyañjakam /
SA15bsa066_u:207: ye yathoktāḥ prāśnikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ kaścidapratīto 'rtha iti /
SA15bsa066_u:211: nanu cātra cāturthyā kriyayā ceti vaktavyalakṣaṇayā bhavitavyaṃ tatkimartha ṣaṣṭhyatrocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:226: dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayaste 'sya vidyante iti dharmī śabdādiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:235: iha dharmiṇastāvatprasiddhatā yuktā viśeṣaṇasya tvanityatvāderna yujyate /
SA15bsa066_u:240: iha prasiddhatā viśeṣaṇasya na tasminneva dharmiṇi samāśrīyate kiṃtu dharmyantare ghaṭādau /
SA15bsa066_u:247: īpsitaḥ abhimataḥ iṣṭa icchāyā vyāpta ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:248: iha ca viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedakatvātprasiddho dharmītyanenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya pakṣābhāsasya vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:252_0: etena yadyapi kvacicchāstre sthtiaḥ sādhanamāha tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmindharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame
SA15bsa066_u:252_1: 'pi yastadānena vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavatīti
SA15bsa066_u:258: ityanena dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣa ityāveditaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa066_u:259: tataśca na dharmamātraṃ na dharmī kevalaḥ na svatantramubhayaṃ na ca tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti bhāvārthaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:260: iha coktalakṣaṇayoge satyapyaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevamādīnāmapi pratyakṣāviruddhānāṃ pakṣatvaprāptyātivyāptirnāma lakṣaṇadoṣaḥ prāpnotītyastannivṛttyarthamāha /
SA15bsa066_u:273: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasyāsau trirūpaḥ trisvabhāva ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:274: ekasya vastuno nānātvamapaśyan pṛcchaka āha kiṃ punastrirūpyam /
SA15bsa066_u:278: evaṃ pṛcchakena pṛṣṭaḥ sannāhācāryaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvameva /
SA15bsa066_u:296: tathā ca satyekāntato vipakṣavyāvṛttāḥ sapakṣaikadeśavyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvādayaḥ samyagghetava evetyāveditaṃ bhavati //
SA15bsa066_u:297: sapakṣe sattvamityādi yaduktaṃ tatra sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ svarūpamajānāno vineyaḥ pṛcchati /
SA15bsa066_u:298: kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ ko vā vipakṣa iti /
SA15bsa066_u:331: iha ca sādhyapratibandhatvāt sādhanasya tadapi nāstīti gamyate /
SA15bsa066_u:341: kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā anityādau heturiti yogaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:343: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
SA15bsa066_u:347: tasya prayatnānantaraṃ tatra bhāvo jāta iti vā prayatnānantarīyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:355: ayaṃ ca hetuḥ kiṃ pakṣadharma eva na tu pakṣasyaiva dharmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:359: tathā saphala evāstvanyayogavyavacchedaḥ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:360: anena tu sādhāraṇādīnāṃ navānāmapi hetvābhāsānāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:362: yadi sapakṣa evāsti tataśca tadvyatirekeṇānyatra pakṣe 'pyabhāvāt dharmatvānupapattiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:366: yadyevaṃ vipakṣe nāsti eveti tṛtīyamavadhāraṇaṃ kimartham? /
SA15bsa066_u:370: anvayavyatirekayorekamapi rūpamuktaṃ kathaṃ nu nāma dvitīyasyākṣepakaṃ syāditi /
SA15bsa066_u:381: dve vidhe yasya sa dvividhastadeva dvaividhyam /
SA15bsa066_u:383: samāno dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena /
SA15bsa066_u:384: visadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau vidharmā vidharmaṇo bhāvaḥ vaidharmyaṃ tena /
SA15bsa066_u:390: sapakṣa uktalakṣaṇastasmiṃścāstitvaṃ vidyamānatvaṃ khyāpyate pratipādyate vacanena /
SA15bsa066_u:392: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ iti sugamam /
SA15bsa066_u:418: na tu bhāvādanyo 'bhāvo nāma vastusvarūpo 'sti evaṃ nityaśabdenātretyādi dārṣṭāntike 'pi bhāvitameva //
SA15bsa066_u:429: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam /
SA15bsa066_u:440: tatrāpi pakṣādivacanāni sādhanamiti pakṣasyopalakṣaṇatvātprathamaṃ pakṣa uktaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:456: iha punaḥ pratyakṣaśabdena tatparicchinno dharmaḥ parigṛhyate śālikuḍavanyāyāt /
SA15bsa066_u:465: ayaṃ ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi pratyakṣaprasiddhena śrāvaṇatvena virudhyate iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:467: śrāvaṇatvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇatvātpratyakṣagamyameva na bhavati kathaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddhadharmaviruddhaḥ? iti /
SA15bsa066_u:470: atra ca bahu vaktavyaṃ tattu nocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:481: vaiśeṣiko 'hamityevaṃ pakṣaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā yadā śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānite tadāgamavirūddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:483: uktaṃ ca buddhimatpūrvā vākyakṛtirvede tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyamityādi //
SA15bsa066_u:488: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi lokaprasiddhaśucitvena nirākriyata iti /
SA15bsa066_u:497: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi svavacanaprasiddhena mātṛtvena viruddhyate /
SA15bsa066_u:498: virodhaśca mātṛśabdena prasavadharmiṇī vanitocyate vandhyāśabdena tadviparītā /
SA15bsa066_u:502: bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabde iti /
SA15bsa066_u:509: ayaṃ ca bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati aprasiddhiviśeṣaṇaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:523: ato dṛṣṭāntaṃ prasādhya prayogaḥ kartavya iti /
SA15bsa066_u:526: tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati cetana ātmeti /
SA15bsa066_u:530: iti pakṣaḥ sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:541: tathāhi- tantavaḥ paṭasya samacāyikāraṇaṃ tantusaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ turīvemādayastu nimittakāraṇam /
SA15bsa066_u:546: na tasyātmā viśeṣyaḥ siddho nāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
SA15bsa066_u:549: tathā prasiddhasaṃbandho yathā śrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa066_u:550: prasiddho vādiprativādinoravipratipattyā sthitaḥ saṃbandho dharmadharmilakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:561: dharmasvarūpasya nirākaraṇaṃ tattathā mukhamiva mukhaṃ dvāramiti bhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:571: viphalasya bhāvo vaiphalyaṃ sādhanasya vaiphalyaṃ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ tasmātsādhanavaiphalyataḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:585: asiddhaḥ sidhyati sa siddhaḥ pratītaḥ na siddhaḥ asiddhaḥ apratītaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:592: anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā asiddha anyatarāsiddhaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:601: śabdānityatve sādhye anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityetasmin cākṣuṣatvāditi /
SA15bsa066_u:604: tathāhi- cākṣuṣatvaṃ na vādinaḥ prasiddhaṃ nāpi prativādinaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:608: vartate kṛtakatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ śabdābhivyaktivādinaṃ mīmāṃsakaṃ kāpilaṃ vā pratyanyatarāsiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:609: tathāhi- na tasya tālvoṣṭhapuṭādibhiḥ kriyate śabdaḥ kiṃtvabhivyajyata iti //
SA15bsa066_u:611: bāṣpo jalādiprabhavaḥ sa ādiryasya reṇuvartyādeḥ sa bāṣpādistasya bhāvaḥ sattā tena bāṣpādibhāvena /
SA15bsa066_u:612: saṃdihyamānaḥ kimayaṃ dhūma uta bāṣpa uta reṇuvartiriti saṃdehamāpadyamānaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:617: niścito hi dhūmo dhūmatvena hutavahaṃ gamayati nāniścita iti /
SA15bsa066_u:623: saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ śabdeśceti //
SA15bsa066_u:628: pañca imāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ kalpanāmātram /
SA15bsa066_u:630: atītaḥ addhā anāgataḥ addhā pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ ākāśaṃ pugdala iti /
SA15bsa066_u:631: nanu cānyo 'pyasti asiddhaḥ sa ca dvidhā /
SA15bsa066_u:654: ṣaṭ prakārā asyeti ṣaṭprakāraḥ ṣaḍ vidhaityarthaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:661: dvayorbahūnāṃ vā yaḥ sāmānyaḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:662: pramīyate iti prameyo jñeya ityarthaḥ tadbhāvaḥ prameyatvaṃ tasmātprameyatvāt pramāṇaparicchedyatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:669: nityaścānityaśca nityānityau nityānityau ca tau pakṣau ca nityānityapakṣau /
SA15bsa066_u:674: kiṃ ghaṭavat prameyatvādanityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvidākāśavat prameyatvānnitya iti prakaṭārthaṃ darśayati /
SA15bsa066_u:686: sādhāraṇavilakṣaṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ asāmānyaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ san sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:692: tatredaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ svadharmiṇaṃ vihāya na sapakṣe ākāśādau nāpi vipakṣe ghaṭādau vartata iti saṃśayanimittam /
SA15bsa066_u:700: yadasti tena nityena vā bhavitavyamanityena vā nānyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:707: yadi tadanyatra nitye vānitye vopalabdhaṃ bhavati tatastabdalenetaratrāpi niścayo yujyate nānyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:714: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasyaikadeśaḥ sapakṣaikadeśaḥ tasminvṛttirasyeti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:715: tathā visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣastaṃ vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vipakṣavyāpī /
SA15bsa066_u:760: upanyastaḥ san tathāvidhārthānirākṛteḥ pratiyoginaṃ na vyabhicaratīti bhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:762: anye tu viruddhaścāsāvavyabhicārī ca viruddhāvyabhicārīti vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:769: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte mīmāṃsaka āha /
SA15bsa066_u:771: śabdatvaṃ hi nāma veṇuvīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhedabhinneṣu sarvaśabdeṣu śabda ityabhinnābhidhānapratyayanibandhanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñitaṃ nityamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:773: ekatra dharmiṇi ubhayoḥ kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāt saṃdehahetutvā /
SA15bsa066_u:774: tathā caikatra dharmiṇi kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvākhyau hetu saṃdehaṃ kurutaḥ kiṃ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadanityaḥ āhosvicchrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavannityaḥ iti /
SA15bsa066_u:775: evaṃ saṃdehahetutve pratipādite paraścodayati kiṃ samastayoḥ saṃdehahetutvam uta vyastayoḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:787: sa cānenāṃśenācāryeṇa bhinna upātta iti tasmādadoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:796: tathā hyayaṃ dharmasvarūpādiviparītasādhanārddharmeṇa dharmiṇā vā virudhyata eveti catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:804: tasya svarūpamasādhāraṇāmātmalakṣaṇa dharmasvarūpaṃ tasya viparītasādhana iti samāsaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:807: yathā nitya śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādvā ityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvadviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:813: āha ayamapakṣadharmatvādasiddhānna viśiṣyate kathaṃ viruddha iti? /
SA15bsa066_u:824: dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhana ityasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavat iti /
SA15bsa066_u:833: tatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā melakaḥ saṃghātastasya bhāvaḥ saṃghātatvaṃ tasmātsaṃghātatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:838: yathaitadaṅgāni saṃghātatvāddevadattādiparārthāni vartante evaṃ cakṣurādayo 'pīti bhāvārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:841: ayaṃ hetuḥ saṃghātatvalakṣano yathā yena prakāreṇa pārārthyaṃ parārthabhāvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa saṃhatatvamapi sāvayavatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:845: ubhayatreti parārthe saṃhatatve ca avyabhicārād gamakatvādityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:846: tathā caivamapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva saṃhataparārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavaditi /
SA15bsa066_u:847: śayanāsaṇādyaṅgāni hi saṃhatasya karacaraṇorugrīvādimata evārthaṃ kurvanti nānyasya /
SA15bsa066_u:849: āha vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddha iti sāmānyaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇaṃ tatkathamihopapadyate? iti /
SA15bsa066_u:851: asaṃhataparavipakṣo hi saṃhata iti tatraiva vṛttidarśanāt /
SA15bsa066_u:862: tataḥ pṛthvyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi /
SA15bsa066_u:864: rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhiḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ prayatnaśceti sūtroktāḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:865: caśabdāt dravatvaṃ gurutvaṃ saṃskāraḥ sneho dharmādharmau śabdaśceti /
SA15bsa066_u:871: tatra paraṃ sattā bhāvo mahāsāmānyamiti cocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:880: ekadravyavattvādityatra ekaṃ ca taddravyaṃ ca ekadravyamasyāstīti āśrayabhūtamiti ekadravyavān /
SA15bsa066_u:884: vaiśeṣikasya hi adravyaṃ dravyaṃ anekadravyaṃ ca dravyam /
SA15bsa066_u:889: ityato dravyalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvāt na dravyaṃ bhāva iti /
SA15bsa066_u:892: dravyatvaṃ hi navasu dravyeṣu vartamānatvātsāmānyaṃ guṇakarmabhyo vyāvartamānatvādviśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:894: tataśca sāmānyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaśca sa iti sāmānyaviśeṣastena tulyaṃ vartata iti sāmānyaviśeṣavat /
SA15bsa066_u:897: yathā navasu dravyeṣu pratyekaṃ vartamānaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati kiṃtu sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvameva evaṃ bhāvo 'pītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:898: āha yadi nāma dravyaṃ na bhavati tathāpi guṇobhaviṣyati karma ca ityetadapi nirācikīrṣurāha /
SA15bsa066_u:900: tataśca na guṇo bhāvaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvād guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:901: yadi ca bhāvo guṇaḥ syānna tarhi guṇeṣu varteta nirguṇatvād guṇānām /
SA15bsa066_u:904: tathā na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvātkarmatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:905: yadi ca bhāvaḥ karma syāt na tarhi karmasu varteta niṣkarmakatvātkarmaṇām /
SA15bsa066_u:910: ayaṃ ca hetustriprakāro 'pi yathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ sādhayati tathā bhāvasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvatvamapi sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:916: yatathaidbaktuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat evamidamapi śakyate bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:918: evaṃ na guṇaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:919: atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:921: evaṃ na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:924: āha ayamasiddhānna viśiṣyate iti kathaṃ viruddhaḥ? /
SA15bsa066_u:926: na bhāvo nāma dravyādivyatiriktaḥ kaścidasti saugatānām /
SA15bsa066_u:929: kiṃtu paraprasiddho 'pi vipakṣamātravyāpī viruddha iti nidarśanārthatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:934: tathāpyanityaḥ śabdaḥ pākyatvādghatavat pākyaḥ śabda iti viruddhapreraṇāyāṃ kṛtakatvānvitāpākyapaṭādidṛṣṭāntāntarasāmarthyāttannivṛttyā na viruddhatā /
SA15bsa066_u:941: yata uktaṃ saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā /
SA15bsa066_u:943_0: ayameva heturekadravyavattvākhyaḥ asminneva pūrvapakṣe na dravyaṃ bhāva ityādilakṣaṇe
SA15bsa066_u:943_1: asyaiva dharmiṇo bhāvākhyasya yo viśeṣo dharmaḥ satpratyayakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparitamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:945: tathā hyetadapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva bhāvaḥ satpratyayakartā na bhavati ekadravyavattvādravyatvat /
SA15bsa066_u:954: tatra yathā dṛṣṭānto dvividhaḥ evaṃ mūlabhedavyapekṣayā tadābhāso 'pi tathā /
SA15bsa066_u:961: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaddṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ pañcabhedaḥ tadyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:966: na tu bahubrīhau niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti kṛtvāsiddhasādhanadharmā iti /
SA15bsa066_u:969: anye tu sādhanadharmeṇa rahitatvādasiddhaḥ sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:973: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eveti yathākramaṃ nirdiśyate /
SA15bsa066_u:980: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuriti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvam /
SA15bsa066_u:994: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:995: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti anityatvādbuddhoriti sūtraprayogaḥ sugama eva /
SA15bsa066_u:997: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:1013: tataśca nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvādghaṭavadityatra na sādhyadharmo nityatvalakṣaṇaḥ nāpi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvalakṣaṇo 'sti anityatvānmūrtatvādghaṭasyeti /
SA15bsa066_u:1039: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
SA15bsa066_u:1046: yathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādiyatra yadyadanityaṃ tattatprayatnāntarīyakam /
SA15bsa066_u:1083: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāseṣvādau sādhanadharmāsiddha uktaḥ iha sādhyāvyāvṛtta iti kimarthamucyate? /
SA15bsa066_u:1086: vyatirekastu ubhayavyāvṛttirūpaḥ sādhyābhāve ca hetorabhāva iti /
SA15bsa066_u:1110: vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā prastutaprayoge yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamityādilakṣaṇayā /
SA15bsa066_u:1114: yathā ghaṭe 'nityatvaṃ ca murtatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:1118: viparīto viparyasto vyatireka uktalakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:1121: prastutaprayoga eva tathāvidhasādharmyadṛṣṭāntayukte vyatirekamupadeśayan yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭa miti vaktavye yanmūrta tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
SA15bsa066_u:1126: tathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādityatra yadaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ tannityamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:1138: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe /
SA15bsa066_u:1145: tathāhi bauddhānāṃ dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣānumāne /
SA15bsa066_u:1156: kalpanā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā sā apoḍhā apetā yasmāt tat kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15bsa066_u:1163: tacca nirviṣayamapi bhavati ata āha arthe viṣaye /
SA15bsa066_u:1167: iha yaduktaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamiti tatsvarūpābhidhānata eva vyācaṣṭe nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam /
SA15bsa066_u:1178: na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te 'pi pratibhāserannityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:1184: yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti? /
SA15bsa066_u:1190: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
SA15bsa066_u:1194: manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya /
SA15bsa066_u:1205: agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:1225: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram /
SA15bsa066_u:1232: viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti /
SA15bsa066_u:1233: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate /
SA15bsa066_u:1234: so 'syā vidyata iti sadyāpāravatī śeṣaṃ pūrvavat vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:1239: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate /
SA15bsa066_u:1248: hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena /
SA15bsa066_u:1249: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yadanumeye 'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam /
SA15bsa066_u:1264: tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tudbhāvanamātrameva /
SA15bsa066_u:1269: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni /
